gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 120, Cavaliers 118
gameRecap.excerpt: The Clippers overcome a 26-point deficit as they defeat the Cavaliers, 120-118. Paul George led the way for the Clippers with 39 points (23 in the fourth quarter), 11 rebounds and seven assists, while James Harden added 22 points, five rebounds and five assists in the victory. Darius Garland tallied 28 points, eight assists and five steals for the Cavaliers in the losing effort. The Clippers win their third straight game as they improve to 50-28 on the season, while the Cavaliers fall to 46-33.
